name: Desolate (itch) (JoltGames)
description:
This is a survival game made with ue4 assets I used to see what I was capable of in the engine this is a free game and I hope you have a decent time playing with the mechanics. This game will get very frequent updates once I figure out how lmao to.

Currently the game is very poorly optimized but i already fixed that within the newest update I am releasing next week.
